title: Broadview's Rebecca Sommi to Be Honored with 2015 Women in Tech Award
text:
Broadview's Rebecca Sommi to Be Honored with 2015 Women in Tech Award [September 01, 2015] Tweet 
Broadview Networks ( News - Alert ) ® , a leading cloud-based provider of communications and information technology services, announced today that Rebecca Sommi, Senior Vice President of Operations Support and Engineering, has been selected to receive the 2015 Women in Tech Award. This award, presented by the Westchester County Association, recognizes outstanding women for their accomplishments in life sciences and technology, and will be presented on October 1, 2015 at the annual Women in Tech Awards Luncheon, held at Tappan Hill Mansion in Tarrytown, N.Y. 
"The Women in Tech luncheon provides a forum for women to share their stories and for us to shine a light on their successes," noted Marissa Brett, President of the Westchester County Association. "Westchester is a leader in technology and the life sciences, and we are proud to recognize these trailblazing women whose work improves our daily lives." 
Ms. Sommi, who joined Broadview in 1999, has more than 30 years of experience in telecommunications technology. She is responsible for such critical areas as vendor management, network planning, logistics and regulatory support. Prior to joining Broadview, she served as the Director of External Affairs for the Eastern TeleLogic Corporation, where she participated in the first application for a competitive local exchange (CLEC) license in Pennsylvania after deregulation. 
"I am truly honored to be recognized by the WA, especially amongst such an extraordinary group of professional women," Ms. Sommi said. "It is very fulfilling to be recognized in the field, and I hope this recognition will inspire others who share my passion for technology." 
"Rebecca's extensive expertise in technology and telecommunications has been a huge asset to us," said Brian Crotty, Chief Operating Officer for Broadview. "Her dynamic role has been fundamental to the success of several of our strategic acquisitions in this ever-evolving marketplace, and we are so pleased that her accomplishments are being recognized by the Westchester County Association." 
About Broadview Networks ® www.broadviewnet.com 
Broadview Networks is a network-based business communications provider serving customers with local and long-distance voice and data communications, premises-based and patented hosted VoIP systems, data services and a full suite of managed and professional services. It also provides an innovative portfolio of bundled, hosted IP phone and cloud computing services designed to meet the unique application requirements of diverse workforce groups. Its customers benefit from award-winning customer service, including a Web-based account management tool and a primary point-of-contact for real-time, personal customer care. 
About Westchester County Association www.westchester.org 
Westchester County Associationis the leading business organization serving Westchester County and the region. The Association is committed to business advocacy, economic vitality, and to providing a strong and clear voice for the interests of businesses on the local, regional, and national levels. Its key objectives are to promote positive economic development in the region, foster business development, and provide its members with access and interaction with key public and private sector individuals, agencies, and organizations.
